name: Rat Platter
description:
In the town of Mascarpone, you and other rats have lived in harmony with humans for many years, helping each other enhance the culinary experience. All until a new wave of chefs come to town, who all despise the idea of rodents being in the kitchen, and take over almost all of the restaurants and force all rats out of our homes. You take the job of turning the wretched places upside down, starting from the “humble” fast-food restaurants, to the “big-dog” Michelin star restaurants.

Team - Customer Service

  • Hector “Ále” Acevedo - Technical Sound Design, Music, Sound Design
  • Sunny Agrawal - System Design, AI Design, UX Programmer
  • Joshua Churchill - Level Design
  • Anthony Hoang - Game Systems Programmer, Scrum Master
  • Eduardo Monroy - 3D Artist
  • Vera Pei - 2D Artist
  • Kelly Shen - 2D Artist/Animator, Technical Artist
